A Collection in

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of John F. Greenlee and the Greenlee family
1858-1898

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of John F. Greenlee and the Greenlee family, Accession #5213-c, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers chiefly contain receipts and financial and legal instruments of John F. Greenlee, including a county tax book; a fee book, 1859-1861; and pocket account books. There is miscellaneous material regarding taxes and tax sales and also regarding a Lynchburg, Va., circuit court, 1860.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p:
1832, Fourth Report of the American Temperance Society,1 vol.
n.d., Treatise on Soils and Manures,1 vol.
